scripts.setup: npm run create-folders && npm run install-packages
scripts.install-packages: npm i react react-dom && npm i -D @types/react @types/react-dom @vitejs/plugin-react sass typescript vite vite-tsconfig-paths
scripts.create-folders: cd src && mkdir components mechanisms && cd components && mkdir atoms molecules organisms && cd ../mechanisms && mkdir Core Modules Components && cd ../../public && mkdir fonts pics
